毇字的基本解释

毇
huǐ
舂或碾米使精：“太羹不和，粢食不毇”。“畜力挽行，循槽转辗，日可毇米三十馀斛。”

毇字的汉语字典释义

[①]［huǐ］
［《廣韻》許委切，上紙，曉。］
将糙米舂细。

毇字的康熙字典解释

【辰集下】【殳字部】　毇； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页587第20
【唐韻】許委切。【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】虎委切，?音毀。【說文】米一斛，舂爲八斗。　又與鑿通。【左傳·桓二年·粢食不鑿釋文】鑿，精米也。《字林》作毇，子沃反。【淮南子·主術訓】作粢食不毇。【註】毇，音毀。細也。○按此知鑿與毇義本同，但音別耳。《說文》分二字，謂毇一斛舂八斗。糳一斛舂九斗。據此說，毇米較精。　又【集韻】卽各切，音作。又租毒切，音傶。?與糳同。義見上。　【廣韻】又作?。【集韻】或作?、?。

毇
Basic explanation of words
毇
huǐ
Grinding or milling rice makes fine: "Too much soup and discord, too much food to eat." "The animal power can turn around, follow the trough, the day can be more than 30 hu."
毇
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [huǐ]
["Guang Yun" Xu Weiqi, on paper, Xiao. ]
Peel the brown rice finely.
毇
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Jixia] [Department of 殳字]　毇; Kangxi strokes: 16; Page number: page 587 20
[Tang Yun] Xu Weiqie. [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun] The tiger is cut, and the sound is destroyed. [Said the text] Mi Yihu, pounding into eight buckets.　Connect with chisel again. [Zuo Zhuan·Huan Ernian·Explanation of the Essence of Suspicion] Chisel, polished rice. "The Forest of Characters" is a dream, and Zi Wo is against it. 【Huainanzi·Master Skill Training】Being a glutton can not eat too much. [Note] 毇, the sound is destroyed. Fine too. ○According to this, the knowledge is the same as the original text, but the sound is not the ear. "Shuowen" is divided into two characters, which is called 毇一於舂八斗. Nine buckets of glutinous rice noodles. According to this, 毇米 is more refined.　[Jiyun] 卽 each cut, sound made. Also rent poison and cut, Yin Zhang. ? Same as 糳. Righteous see above.　[Guangyun] Again? [Ji Yun] Or make?,?.
